english: undershirt (also: T-shirt, soccer jersey; UK: vest)
undershirt (also: T-shirt, soccer jersey; UK: vest)
to take __ out of one’s pocket
What size shoes do you wear?
I’m not sure about my (clothing) size.
I’m not sure about my (clothing) size.
to wear, to get dressed, to put on
What are you going to wear today?
He took a shower, got dressed, and left for work.
just right (not too loose or tight)
I think I need the next size up.
This shirt is wrinkled. I need to iron it.

arabic: أيْه ده، إنْتَ لابِس نضّارة النّهارْده!

english: a diamond ring, gold bracelet, and silver necklace
transliteration: xāʈim ʔalmāʐ, ɣiwēša dáhab, wi 3uʔdə fáɖɖa
arabic: خاتِم ألْماظ، غِويْشة دهب و عُقْد فضّة
